properties.script:
out0 = spark.sql(f"""
    SELECT
  '{Config.sourceSystem}'  AS SRC_SYS_CD,
  LIPS.vbeln AS DELV_NUM,
  LIPS.posnr AS DELV_LINE_NBR,
  LIKP.lfart AS DELV_TYP_CD,
  VBAK.bukrs_vf AS CO_CD,
  TRIM(LIPS.arktx) AS MATL_SHRT_DESC,
  TRIM(LIPS.bwart) AS MATL_MVMT_TYPE_CD,
  TRIM(LIPS.vgbel) AS DOC_REF_NUM,
  TRIM(LIPS.komkz) AS PICK_CNTL_STS_CD,
  TRIM(LIPS.pstyv) AS LINE_ITEM_CAT_CD,
  TRIM(LIPS.sobkz) AS SPL_STK_TYPE_CD,
  CAST (TRIM(LIPS.uecha) AS INT) AS PARNT_BTCH_SPLT_CNTR_NBR,
  CAST (TRIM(LIPS.uepos) AS INT) AS PARNT_BOM_CNTR_NBR,
  CAST (TRIM(LIPS.umvkz) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS FCTR_NMRTR_MEAS,
  CAST (TRIM(LIPS.umvkn) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS FCTR_DNMNTR_MEAS,
  CASE
    WHEN LIKP.wadat_ist = '00000000' THEN CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP)
 WHEN LENGTH(LIKP.wadat_ist) < 8 THEN NULL
    ELSE TO_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(LIKP.wadat_ist), 'yyyyMMdd')
  END AS ACTL_GI_DTTM,
  CAST (TRIM(LIPS.lfimg) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS ACTL_SLS_UNIT_DELV_QTY,
  CAST (TRIM(LIPS.lgmng) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS ACTL_SKU_DELV_QTY,
  TRIM(LIPS.meins) AS BASE_UOM_CD,
  TRIM(LIPS.charg) AS BTCH_NUM,
  TRIM(VBUP.uvfak) AS BILL_ICMPT_STS_CD,
  TRIM(VBUP.besta) AS CNFRM_STS_CD,
  CASE
    WHEN LIPS.hsdat = '00000000' THEN CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP)
 WHEN LENGTH(LIPS.hsdat) < 8 THEN NULL
    ELSE TO_TIMESTAMP(LIPS.hsdat, 'yyyyMMdd')
  END AS MFG_DTTM,
  TRIM(VBUP.fksta) AS DELV_BILL_STS_CD,
  TRIM(LIPS.spe_gen_elikz) AS DELV_CMPLT_IND,
  TRIM(VBUP.uvvlk) AS DELV_ICMPT_STS_CD,
  TRIM(VBUP.LFSTA) AS DELV_STS_CD,
  TRIM(VBUP.LFGSA) AS DELV_TOT_STS_CD,
  CASE
    WHEN LIPS.vfdat = '00000000' THEN CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP)
 WHEN LENGTH(LIPS.vfdat) < 8 THEN NULL
    ELSE TO_TIMESTAMP(LIPS.vfdat, 'yyyyMMdd')
  END AS EXP_DTTM,
  TRIM(VBUP.uvwak) AS GM_ICMPT_STS_CD,
  TRIM(VBUP.wbsta) AS GM_STS_CD,
  TRIM(VBUP.fkivp) AS INTCO_BILL_STS_CD,
  TRIM(LIPS.matnr) AS MATL_NUM,
  TRIM(VBUP.uvall) AS ICMPT_STS_CD,
  CAST(TRIM(LIPS.ZZCONTAINER) AS INT) AS NUM_OF_CNTNRS_CNT,
  TRIM(VBUP.FKSAA) AS ORDR_BILL_STS_CD,
  TRIM(VBUP.uvpak) AS PACK_ICMPT_STS_CD,
  TRIM(VBUP.pksta) AS PACK_STS_CD,
  TRIM(VBUP.koqua) AS PICK_CNFRM_STS_CD,
  TRIM(VBUP.uvpik) AS PICK_ICMPT_STS_CD,
  TRIM(VBUP.kosta) AS PICK_STS_CD,
  TRIM(VBUP.UVPRS) AS PRC_ICMPT_STS_CD,
  TRIM(VBUP.gbsta) AS PRCSG_TOT_STS_CD,
  TRIM(LIPS.umwrk) AS RECV_PLNT_CD,
  TRIM(VBUP.RFSTA) AS REF_STS_CD,
  TRIM(VBUP.RFGSA) AS REF_TOT_STS_CD,
  TRIM(VBUP.ABSTA) AS REJ_STS_CD,
  TRIM(LIPS.vgpos) AS SLS_ORDR_LINE_NBR_REF,
  NULL AS SLS_ORDR_TYPE_CD,
  TRIM(LIPS.vrkme) AS SLS_UOM_CD,
  TRIM(LIPS.werks) AS SHIPPING_PLNT_CD,
  TRIM(LIPS.lgort) AS SLOC_CD,
  TRIM(LIPS.lichn) AS VEND_BTCH_NUM,
  TRIM(VBUP.lvsta) AS WM_STS_CD,
  CASE
    WHEN (LIPS.erdat = '00000000' OR LIPS.ERZET = '00000000') THEN CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP)
    ELSE TO_TIMESTAMP(
      CONCAT(LIPS.erdat, LIPS.erzet),
      'yyyyMMddHHmmss'
    )
  END AS CRT_DTTM,
  TRIM(LIPS.posar) AS ITM_TYPE,
  TRIM(LIPS.lfpos) AS ITM_OF_REF_DOC,
  CAST (TRIM(LIPS.brgew) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS GRS_WT_MEAS,
  CAST (TRIM(LIPS.ntgew) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS NET_WT_MEAS,
  TRIM(LIPS.gewei) AS WT_UOM_CD,
  CAST (TRIM(LIPS.volum) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS VOL_MEAS,
  TRIM(LIPS.voleh) AS VOL_UOM_CD,
  CAST (TRIM(LIPS.netwr) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS NET_VAL_AMT,
  TRIM(LIPS.PRODH) AS PROD_HIER_CD,
  TRIM(LIPS.MVGR4) AS MATL_GRP_4,
  NULL AS MATL_GRP_4_DESC,
  TRIM(LIPS.VTWEG) AS DSTR_CHNL_CD,
  TRIM(VBUP.FSSTA) AS ITM_BILL_BLK_STS_CD,
  TRIM(VBUP.LSSTA) AS ITM_OVRL_DELV_BLK_STS_CD,
  TRIM(LIPS.MATWA) AS ENT_MATL_NUM,
  TRIM(LIPS.SPART) AS DIVISION_CD,
  TRIM(LIPS.VGTYP) AS DOC_CAT_SD,
  TRIM(LIPS.MATKL) AS MATL_GRP_CD,
  TRIM(LIPS.MTART) AS MATL_TYPE_CD,
  CAST(TRIM(LIPS.KCMENG) AS DECIMAL(18,4)) AS CUM_BTCH_QTY,
  '#' AS ORDR_SFX,
  '#' AS MATCH_TYPE,
  NULL AS LINE_TYPE_DELV,
  '#' AS SRC_TBL_NM,
   CAST(TRIM(LIPS.ORMNG) AS DECIMAL(18,4)) AS ORIG_QTY_DELV_ITM
FROM
  {Config.sourceDatabase}.LIPS LIPS
  LEFT JOIN {Config.sourceDatabase}.LIKP LIKP on LIPS.VBELN = LIKP.VBELN
  AND LIKP._deleted_ = 'F'
  AND LIKP.MANDT = '100'
  LEFT JOIN {Config.sourceDatabase}.VBUP VBUP on LIPS.VGBEL=VBUP.VBELN
  and LIPS.VGPOS=VBUP.POSNR
  AND VBUP._deleted_ = 'F'
  AND VBUP.MANDT = '100'
  LEFT JOIN {Config.sourceDatabase}.VBAK VBAK on LIPS.VGBEL=VBAK.VBELN
  AND VBAK._deleted_ = 'F'
  AND VBAK.MANDT = '100'
WHERE
  LIPS._deleted_ = 'F'
  AND LIPS.MANDT = '100'  
 
""")
